Generation IV.Diamond: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
Generation IV.Pearl: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
Generation IV.Platinum: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.
Generation IV.HeartGold: Its body is covered in fine scales that reduce drag, enabling it to fly at high speeds.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Its body is covered in fine scales that reduce drag, enabling it to fly at high speeds.

Generation V.Black: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.
Generation V.White: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.
Generation V.Black 2: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.
Generation V.White 2: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.

Generation VI.X: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
Generation VI.Y: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.

Generation VII.Sun: Excess energy melted its arms and wings, transforming them into giant scythes.
Generation VII.Moon: Its vaunted wings become scythes, sending it mad with rage. It swings its scythes wildly and slices the ground to pieces.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Its arms and wings melted into something like scythes. Mad with rage, it rampages on and on.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Its disposition is more vicious than before its Mega Evolution. Garchomp carves its opponents up with the scythes on both arms.

Generation VIII.Sword: Garchomp makes its home in volcanic mountains. It flies through the sky as fast as a jet airplane, hunting down as much prey as it can.
Generation VIII.Shield: Garchomp is fast both underground and above. It can bring down prey and return to its den before its body has chilled from being outside.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter plane. It never allows its prey to escape.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Soars across the heavens at blinding speed—a magnificent sight! It has a feral disposition. Utmost caution is required if one meets a Garchomp out in the wilds.

Generation IX.Scarlet: It is said that when one runs at high speed, its wings create blades of wind that can fell nearby trees.
Generation IX.Violet: The protuberances on its head serve as sensors. It can even detect distant prey.
